Summary: Ball of flame in s/w direction,sun size,looked just above south of city ,then looked like it broke up and gone.....
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Winnipeg
There were no other sightings in Winnipeg on or around October 13th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was just coming out of tim hortons on main & burrin.i looked to the south and seen this sun size ball of flame with a short tail heading in a s\w direction.it lasted about 5-7 sec. from where i was standing, about 40-50 ft away from some telephone wires and it was at about that height from where i was standing. it seemed to me it was just over the south part of town.it looked that close. then it seemed to break up and was gone,no more light. i was waiting for an explosion ??? so surreal.........freakey..... there is someone else who saw it,i haven't been able to contact him\her yet. they have a report on kijiji canada.heading ouf sighting over southern manitoba oct.13.......
